table.name: vtiger_callcenter
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_callcenter` ( `callcenterid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `callcentername` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `project_no` varchar(100) default NULL, `call_date` date default NULL, `call_status` varchar(255) default NULL, `linktoaccountscontacts` varchar(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (callcenterid) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_callcentercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_callcentercf` ( `callcenterid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`callcenterid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
